message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $9250.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to reduce the price further. I'm now offering the product to you for $9150.
I'm getting close to my target, but I'd like to get a bit closer. I'm willing to pay $9100 for the product.
I'm willing to meet you at the door, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $9050.
I'm really close to my target, and I'm willing to meet you at $9000. That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $9025.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $9000. If you can meet me at this price, I'll make the deal.
